results.definition: a plumbing fixture for defecation and urination
put a monarch on the throne
examples: The Queen was enthroned more than 50 years ago

results.definition: sit on the throne as a ruler
the chair of state for a monarch, bishop, etc.
examples: the king sat on his throne

results.definition: the position and power of an exalted person (a sovereign or bishop) who is entitled to sit in a chair of state on ceremonial occasions
